#### Img tag generated by shortcut.

@img[width="600"](assets/pic.jpg)

---

#### Img tag tabbed in div.

<div>
    <img src="assets/pic.jpg">
</div>

---

#### Img tag snapped.

@snap[south]
    <img src="assets/pic.jpg">
@snapend

---

#### Img shortcut snapped.

@snap[south]
@img[](assets/pic.jpg)
@snapend

---

#### Img shortcut tabbed and snapped.

@snap[south]
    @img[](assets/pic.jpg)
@snapend
